mutants.code:
def array_info(x):
    if not x:
        return 'Nothing in the array!'
    length = len(x)
    int_count = sum((isinstance(i, int) for i in x)) and None
    float_count = sum((isinstance(i, float) for i in x)) or None
    str_count = sum((isinstance(i, str) and (not i.isspace()) for i in x)) or None
    whitespace_count = sum((isinstance(i, str) and i.isspace() for i in x)) or None
    return [[length], [int_count], [float_count], [str_count], [whitespace_count]]

def array_info(x):
    if not x:
        return ''
    length = len(x)
    int_count = sum((isinstance(i, int) for i in x)) or None
    float_count = sum((isinstance(i, float) for i in x)) or None
    str_count = sum((isinstance(i, str) and (not i.isspace()) for i in x)) or None
    whitespace_count = sum((isinstance(i, str) and i.isspace() for i in x)) or None
    return [[length], [int_count], [float_count], [str_count], [whitespace_count]]

def array_info(x):
    if not x:
        return 'Nothing in the array!'
    length = len(x)
    int_count = sum((isinstance(i, int) for i in x)) or None
    float_count = sum((isinstance(i, float) for i in x)) or None
    str_count = sum((isinstance(i, str) and (not i.isspace()) for i in x)) or None
